casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Otis Redding HOWIE, Jr. No. 285P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Howie, Otis Redding (Jr.). Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 4th of September 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Union County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."

Ervin, J. recused
